trans-unit.source: configuring the connector

seg-source.mrk: configuring the connector

trans-unit.source: Updating Signavio Process Manager

seg-source.mrk: Updating Signavio Process Manager

trans-unit.source: You can only update your on-premises installation from version 11.14.5 and later. If you use an earlier version, update to version 11.14.5 first.

seg-source.mrk: You can only update your on-premises installation from version 11.14.5 and later.
If you use an earlier version, update to version 11.14.5 first.

trans-unit.source: If you use a MS SQL database and update from Signavio Process Manager version 10.x or lower to version 11.x or higher, download and install the new JDBC driver as described in Download JDBC driver for Microsoft SQL Server . Delete the old file sqljdbc4.jar you find in the lib folder of the Apache Tomcat directory.

seg-source.mrk: If you use a MS SQL database and update from Signavio Process Manager version 10.x or lower to version 11.x or higher, download and install the new JDBC driver as described in <MadCap:xref href="installation/install-jdbc-driver.htm#Down" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Download JDBC driver for Microsoft SQL Server </MadCap:xref>.
Delete the old file sqljdbc4.jar you find in the lib folder of the Apache Tomcat directory.

trans-unit.source: If you use an Oracle database and update from version 9.x to version 10.x or higher, download the new Oracle JDBC driver as described in <MadCap:xref href="installation/install-jdbc-driver.htm#Down2" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Download JDBC driver for Oracle </MadCap:xref>and replace the old driver with the downloaded files.

seg-source.mrk: If you use an Oracle database and update from version 9.x to version 10.x or higher, download the new Oracle JDBC driver as described in <MadCap:xref href="installation/install-jdbc-driver.htm#Down2" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Download JDBC driver for Oracle </MadCap:xref>and replace the old driver with the downloaded files.

trans-unit.source: If you are using approval workflows in Signavio Process Manager, please ensure the to-be-installed version of Signavio Process Manager is compatible with the Signavio Workflow Accelerator version you are using. You find a corresponding compatibility list in the Workflow Accelerator administrator guide. To avoid problems with some features, please ensure nobody works with Signavio Workflow Accelerator while Signavio Process Manager is being updated (and vice versa).

seg-source.mrk: If you are using approval workflows in Signavio Process Manager, please ensure the to-be-installed version of Signavio Process Manager is compatible with the Signavio Workflow Accelerator version you are using.
You find a corresponding compatibility list in the Workflow Accelerator administrator guide.
To avoid problems with some features, please ensure nobody works with Signavio Workflow Accelerator while Signavio Process Manager is being updated (and vice versa).

trans-unit.source: The Apache Tomcat team announced that support for Apache Tomcat 8.0.x ended on 30th June 2018. Therefore, Signavio only supports Tomcat version 8.5.x.

seg-source.mrk: The Apache Tomcat team announced that support for Apache Tomcat 8.0.x ended on 30th June 2018.
Therefore, Signavio only supports Tomcat version 8.5.x.

trans-unit.source: This section contains step-by-step instructions on how to update Signavio Process Manager. To run the update, you need a .zip archive that contains the new version.

seg-source.mrk: This section contains step-by-step instructions on how to update Signavio Process Manager.
To run the update, you need a .zip archive that contains the new version.

trans-unit.source: Please ensure nobody tries to use the system during the update.

seg-source.mrk: Please ensure nobody tries to use the system during the update.

trans-unit.source: Stop the Apache Tomcat server.

seg-source.mrk: Stop the Apache Tomcat server.

trans-unit.source: Create a backup of the database and the current program files. You will find the program files in the deployment folder (<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">webapps</kbd>) of the Apache Tomcat directory. You might also want to clean the Tomcat <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">work</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">conf/Catalina</kbd> folders.

seg-source.mrk: Create a backup of the database and the current program files.
You will find the program files in the deployment folder (<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">webapps</kbd>) of the Apache Tomcat directory.
You might also want to clean the Tomcat <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">work</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">conf/Catalina</kbd> folders.

trans-unit.source: In case you are updating from version 8.6.0 or older, please follow the instructions in the chapter Installing the JDBC driver additionally.

seg-source.mrk: In case you are updating from version 8.6.0 or older, please follow the instructions in the chapter Installing the JDBC driver additionally.

trans-unit.source: Copy the update archive <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SignavioEnterpriseX.X.X.zip</kbd> to the server.

seg-source.mrk: Copy the update archive <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SignavioEnterpriseX.X.X.zip</kbd> to the server.

trans-unit.source: Unpack the .zip archive. It contains the directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">files</kbd> and the new program files in it.

seg-source.mrk: Unpack the .zip archive.
It contains the directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">files</kbd> and the new program files in it.

trans-unit.source: In case you are updating from a version older than 9.7.0, integrate the configuration files and the license file into the new installation files. You need to copy the files from several locations within Tomcat’s root directory to the folder conf within Tomcat’s root directory. Below, the tomcat’s root directory is written as $TOMCAT_DIR. Accordingly, the target directory is $TOMCAT_DIR/conf. Copy the following files to $TOMCAT_DIR/conf:

seg-source.mrk: In case you are updating from a version older than 9.7.0, integrate the configuration files and the license file into the new installation files.
You need to copy the files from several locations within Tomcat’s root directory to the folder conf within Tomcat’s root directory.
Below, the tomcat’s root directory is written as <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR</kbd>.
Accordingly, the target directory is <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/conf</kbd>.
Copy the following files to $TOMCAT_DIR/conf:

trans-unit.source: $TOMCAT_DIR/webapps/ROOT/WEB-INF/classes/configuration.xml

seg-source.mrk: $TOMCAT_DIR/webapps/ROOT/WEB-INF/classes/configuration.xml

trans-unit.source: $TOMCAT_DIR/webapps/ROOT/WEB-INF/classes/configuration_signed.xml

seg-source.mrk: $TOMCAT_DIR/webapps/ROOT/WEB-INF/classes/configuration_signed.xml

trans-unit.source: If available:

seg-source.mrk: If available:

trans-unit.source: $TOMCAT_DIR/webapps/ROOT/WEB-INF/classes/simulation.xml

seg-source.mrk: $TOMCAT_DIR/webapps/ROOT/WEB-INF/classes/simulation.xml

trans-unit.source: If available and if you are using HTTPS, copy the following file and paste it into its original destination after you moved the new program files to the new installation directory:

seg-source.mrk: If available and if you are using HTTPS, copy the following file and paste it into its original destination after you moved the new program files to the new installation directory:

trans-unit.source: $TOMCAT_DIR/webapps/solr/META-INF/context.xml

seg-source.mrk: $TOMCAT_DIR/webapps/solr/META-INF/context.xml

trans-unit.source: In addition, go to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/conf</kbd> to add the following information inside the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><Context></kbd> tag of the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">context.xml</kbd>:

seg-source.mrk: In addition, go to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/conf</kbd> to add the following information inside the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><Context></kbd> tag of the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">context.xml</kbd>:

trans-unit.source: Delete the old program files from <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/webapps</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: Delete the old program files from <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/webapps</kbd>.

trans-unit.source: Move the new program files from the directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">files</kbd> to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/webapps</kbd>. Check if the system user that runs the Tomcat has access to newly copied files. If this is not the case, update the corresponding permissions accordingly.

seg-source.mrk: Move the new program files from the directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">files</kbd> to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/webapps</kbd>.
Check if the system user that runs the Tomcat has access to newly copied files.
If this is not the case, update the corresponding permissions accordingly.

trans-unit.source:
Optional: If you are using the SAP Solution Manager 7.2 connector you have to update the file solman72.yml which is located in the Tomcat´s conf folder. Follow the instructions:
  • Replace a part of the code with another snippet. Take out the excisting code: 
    mine:
   poolSize: 30
  • Insert the following snippet instead: 
    hikari:
   maximum-pool-size: 30
  • Add following snippet at the end of the file by copying and pasting:
    # disables error logs created every minute if no influx-DB to log metrics is configured.
    management.metrics.export.influx.enabled: false
  • Ensure that the environment name spring.config.location was set as described here.

seg-source.mrk: Optional: If you are using the SAP Solution Manager 7.2 connector you have to update the file solman72.yml which is located in the Tomcat´s conf folder.
Follow the instructions:
<li>Replace a part of the code with another snippet.

Take out the excisting code: 
mine:
   poolSize: 30

• Insert the following snippet instead: 
    hikari:
   maximum-pool-size: 30

• Add following snippet at the end of the file by copying and pasting:
    # disables error logs created every minute if no influx-DB to log metrics is configured.
    management.metrics.export.influx.enabled: false
• Ensure that the environment name spring.config.location was set as described here.

trans-unit.source: Start the Apache Tomcat server.

seg-source.mrk: Start the Apache Tomcat server.

trans-unit.source: Never stop the Tomcat server while data migrations are running after an update, even if parts of the application can’t be used due to configuration errors. To check if a data migration is running, check the logs of the Tomcat. If you are using a Tomcat cluster, only start one of the Tomcat servers and wait until all migrations have finished.

seg-source.mrk: Never stop the Tomcat server while data migrations are running after an update, even if parts of the application can’t be used due to configuration errors.
To check if a data migration is running, check the logs of the Tomcat.
If you are using a Tomcat cluster, only start one of the Tomcat servers and wait until all migrations have finished.

trans-unit.source: Use the <MadCap:xref href="installation/run-systems-diagnostics.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Diagnostics Tool</MadCap:xref> to ensure the system is configured correctly.

seg-source.mrk: Use the <MadCap:xref href="installation/run-systems-diagnostics.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Diagnostics Tool</MadCap:xref> to ensure the system is configured correctly.

trans-unit.source: Delete the archive <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SignavioEnterpriseX.X.X.zip</kbd> and the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SignavioEnterpriseX.X.X</kbd> folder.

seg-source.mrk: Delete the archive <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SignavioEnterpriseX.X.X.zip</kbd> and the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SignavioEnterpriseX.X.X</kbd> folder.

trans-unit.source: Should the appliance of the update fail on any purpose, exchange the database, program and runtime files with the backups to be able to continue work with the saved data.

seg-source.mrk: Should the appliance of the update fail on any purpose, exchange the database, program and runtime files with the backups to be able to continue work with the saved data.

trans-unit.source: Since version 8.3.0 the search index will be recreated after each update (not on each restart, only on updates). This may take several minutes. Note that the search may not work in that time and you won’t be able to access the content of the Dictionary.

seg-source.mrk: Since version 8.3.0 the search index will be recreated after each update (not on each restart, only on updates).
This may take several minutes.
Note that the search may not work in that time and you won’t be able to access the content of the Dictionary.
